R

radial(int, int) - Method in class cellery.CellArray1D
Retrieves the CellArray1D containing the Cells about the i-th Cell in a symmetric neighborhood of radius r.
randomOnes(float, int, int) - Static method in class cellery.CellerySeeds
Generates a rectangular binary array with randomly placed 1's and 0's whose density is controlled by an integer in range [0,100].
rectangular(int, int) - Static method in class cellery.CellerySeeds
Generates a rectangular binary array with alternating 0's and 1's of the following form: 1 0 1 0 1 0 1 1 0 1 0 1 0 1 1 0 1 0 1 0 1 1 0 1 0 1 0 1 1 0 1 0 1 0 1 1 0 1 0 1 0 1 1 0 1 0 1 0 1
revive() - Method in class cellery.Cell
Revive this Cell
reviveCell(int) - Method in class cellery.CellArray1D
Revives the Cell at position i.
reviveCell(int, int) - Method in class cellery.CellArray2D
Resurrects the Cell at the ij-th position in this
rightCorners(int, int, int) - Method in class cellery.CellArray2D
Returns the number of living Cells in the neighborhood consisting of the north-east and south-west corners of radius r about the ij-th cell.
rightOf(int, int) - Method in class cellery.CellArray1D
Retrieves the number of living Cells in a region of radius r to the right of the Cell at position i
Rule - Class in rules
Handles the transition rules of a Automaton.
Rule(int[], int[]) - Constructor for class rules.Rule
Creates a Rule from two int arrays that carry the conditions for the transition of Cells to the next state for each iteration of the client Automaton.
Rule(int[], int[], boolean) - Constructor for class rules.Rule
Creates a Rule from two int arrays that carry the conditions for the transition of Cells to the next state for each iteration of the client Automaton.
